definition: wholeheartedly/(to devote oneself) heart and soul
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: Yuan Longping devoted himself to his work.
sentences.chinese: 袁隆平全身心投入到工作中。

sentences.english: Today would be the first time I’d plunge in all the way.
sentences.chinese: 今天將是我第一次全身心投入的一天，我感到恐懼。

sentences.english: Wholehearted service makes you felt delicate considerateness and care.
sentences.chinese: 全身心的服務使您感受到入微的體貼與關懷。

sentences.english: Spring Thou up within my heart, Rise to all eternity.
sentences.chinese: 全身心哪都奔向你，一路昇華走永生。

sentences.english: You may realize that I am a sentimental girl. When I love a man I usually devote myself into the love.
sentences.chinese: 我是個性情中人，要是愛一個人，就會全身心投入。

sentences.english: Today would be the first time I'd plunge in all the way. I was terrified.
sentences.chinese: 今天將是我第一次全身心投入的一天，我感到恐懼。

sentences.english: With his help, I underwent the hardest time and devoted myself to the piano at last.
sentences.chinese: 最後我度最難熬的一段，全身心投入到練琴中。

sentences.english: He has devoted himself to his work.
sentences.chinese: 他一直全身心地撲在工作上。

sentences.english: Truly committing is this team’s next step toward high performance.
sentences.chinese: 真正地全身心投入是團隊朝着高績效進軍的下一步。

sentences.english: Believe in yourself with all of your heart. People will notice.
sentences.chinese: 人們會注意到你全身心的相信自己。

sentences.english: Three weeks ago I said that I saw that he was training full fledge .
sentences.chinese: 三週之前，我說過我看到貝克漢姆以全身心投入訓練。

sentences.english: Get ready to commit yourself And never settle for less.
sentences.chinese: 準備好全身心地投入，決不降低要求。

sentences.english: "You have to embrace the totality of his evilness. He's like the devil. " — Ralph Fiennes on playing Voldemort.
sentences.chinese: 必須全身心擁抱他的邪惡，這人就是一惡魔啊。

sentences.english: The actress dedicates herself to charity work.
sentences.chinese: 那名女演員全身心投入了慈善事業。

sentences.english: The 51-year-old seems to be able to put his mind to anything.
sentences.chinese: 51歲的張勝武似乎是能全身心投入的人。

definition: concentrating one's thoughts and efforts/single-minded/bent on/intently
to indulge in/to wallow/absorbed in/deeply engrossed/addicted
